entry.title: Deodorant Cream - Sensitive Skin
entry.summary:
Vendor: Soapwalla
Type: Deodorant
Price: 16.00

Soapwalla's Sensitive Skin deodorant cream offers effective odor protection, minus the baking soda. It melts effortlessly into the skin, delivering powerful moisture absorbency and bacteria inhibitors to keep you smelling and feeling fresh throughout the day.

Lavender Mint - Lavender, peppermint, and tea tree round out the scent and create a stimulating fragrance that effectively and reliably deodorizes.

Citrus - Litsea cubeba, bergaptene-free bergamot (non-photosensitizing), and citrus essential oils round out the scent and create a stimulating fragrance that effectively and reliably deodorizes.

Sensitive Skin Deodorant Creams Contain:

- Club Moss + Charcoal absorb excess moisture and naturally deodorize

- Shea Butter + Jojoba soothe and soften delicate skin

- Cajeput + Palmarosa essential oils discourage bacteria, fungus and microbes

• No aluminum. No odor. No BS.

• 2 oz

Ingredients

Citrus: Zea mays (Corn) starch*, Butyrospermum parkii (Shea) butter*, Helianthus annuus (Sunflower) seed oil*, Magnesium hydroxide, Kaolin, Lycopodium clavatum (Club moss) extract, Sunflower lecithin*, Litsea cubeba (May chang) fruit oil*, Cymbopogon flexuosus (Lemongrass) herb oil*, Citrus bergamia (Bergaptene-free bergamot) fruit oil*, Citrus sinensis dulcis (Sweet orange) peel oil*, Citrus aurantifolia (Lime) peel oil*, Tocopherol, Melaleuca cajeputi (Cajeput) oil*, Cymbopogon martini (Palmarosa) oil*, Activated Charcoal, Vanilla planifolia fruit extract, Limonene**, Citral**, Linalool**, Geraniol**. *Certified Organic, **Naturally occurring in essential oils.

Lavender Mint: Zea mays (Corn) starch*, Butyrospermum parkii (Shea) butter*, Helianthus annuus (Sunflower) seed oil*, Magnesium hydroxide, Lycopodium clavatum (Club moss) extract, Kaolin, Sunflower lecithin*, Lavandula angustofolia (Lavender) oil, Melaleuca alternifolia (Tea tree) leaf oil, Glycerin*, Tocopherol, Citrus bergamia (Bergaptene-free bergamot) fruit oil*, Citrus sinensis dulcis (Sweet orange) peel oil*, Mentha piperita (Peppermint) oil*, Melaleuca cajeputi (Cajeput) oil*, Cymbopogon martini (Palmarosa) oil*, Activated Charcoal, Limonene**, Linalool**, Geraniol**, Citral**. *Certified Organic, **Naturally occurring in essential oils.

Directions

Please use within 12 months of purchase. Ensure that the Deodorant Cream is mixed completely before applying (some separation is normal), then scoop a little with your finger and very gently apply to the entire underarm area until completely absorbed. Go about your day, odor-free!

Note: The Deodorant Cream may arrive in a liquefied state, but don't fret! Soapwalla doesn’t use any unnecessary waxes or hardeners, so temperature fluctuations can alter the solidity of the Deodorant but in no way compromises the effectiveness of the product. Simply mix well, then pop the container in your freezer for about 20 minutes until resolidified. Your Deodorant Cream will be as good as new!

entry.title: Phosphorescence Facial Mask
entry.summary:
Vendor: Soapwalla
Type: Facial Mask
Price: 68.00

Illuminate skin with the Phosphorescence Facial Mask: Formulated to encourage skin to reclaim its natural glow, the Phosphorescence Facial Mask features a featherlight jelly texture that soothes, clarifies, and hydrates skin -- the perfect treatment for combination, dry, irritated and sensitive skin.

Formulated with algae + natural sea kelp bioferment, which is rich in iodine, copper, molybdate and magnesium. Food-grade chlorophyll, raw grapeseed oil, and pure lavender moisturize, repair, and calm irritation.

• All Natural Ingredients

• Paraben free, Sulfate free

• 2 oz

Ingredients

Lactobacillus/Kelp ferment filtrate (Sea kelp bioferment), Porphyridium (Red algae) extract, Fucoxanthin (Brown algae), Chlorophyll*+, Vitis vinifera (Grape) seed oil*+, Squalane (Olive)*, Lavandula angustifolia (Lavender)*, Linalool**. *certified organic +foodgrade **Naturally occurring in essential oils

Directions

Gently apply to cleansed skin and leave on for 10-20 minutes, depending on skin sensitivity. Rinse with cool water, and follow with toning mist and moisturizer. Pinkish skin after application indicates increased blood circulation (which is good!). Use twice a week.

entry.title: Luxurious Body Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Soapwalla
Type: Body Oil
Price: 32.00

Feed your skin with Soapwalla’s Luxurious Body Oils! Their Body Oils contain jojoba, rice bran, sunflower, and grapeseed oils that lock in moisture.

Original Body Oil - Scented with pure ginger, citrus and lemongrass essential oils, this Body Oil is truly divine for all skin types.

Lavender Vanilla Mint - Scented with pure vanilla, lavender and mint essential oils for a stunning fragrance.

Citrus Almond - Scented with pure almond and citrus essential oils for an intoxicating fragrance.

• Cruelty Free + Vegan

• Made with the highest quality organic + food-grade ingredients

• 4 oz

Ingredients

strong>Original Body Oil: Simmondsia chinensis (Jojoba) Oil*; Oryza Sativa (Rice Bran) Oil; Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Oil*; Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil*; Mowrah Butter; Non-GMO Tocopherol (Vitamin E)*+; a proprietary blend of essential oils including: Zingiber Officinale (Ginger)*, Cymbopogon (Lemongrass)*, Citrus Sinensis (Sweet Orange)*, Organic Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Peel*. *certified organic, +: food-grade

Lavender Vanilla Mint Body Oil: Simmondsia chinensis (Jojoba) Oil*; Oryza Sativa (Rice Bran) Oil; Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil*; Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Oil*; Salvia Hispanica (Chia Seed) Oil+; Adansonia digitata (Baobab) Oil*; Non-GMO Tocopherol (Vitamin E)*+; a proprietary blend of essential oils including: Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender)*, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint)*, Mentha Spicata (Spearmint)*; Vanilla planifolia (Vanilla) fruit extract. *certified organic, +food-grade

Citrus Almond Body Oil: Simmondsia chinensis (Jojoba) Oil*; Oryza Sativa (Rice Bran) Oil; Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil*; Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Oil*; Echium Plantagineum (Echium) Seed Oil*; Salvia Hispanica (Chia Seed) Oil+; Adansonia Digitata (Baobab) Oil*; Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil*+; Non-GMO Tocopherol (Vitamin E)*+; a proprietary blend of essential oils including: Citrus aurantium bergamia (Bergaptene-free Bergamot)*, Citrus Sinensis (Sweet Orange)*, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Petitgrain) Leaf, Citrus Reticulala (Tangerine), Helichrysum Angustifolium (Immortelle), Prunus Amygdalus Amara (Bitter Almond) Kernel Essential Oils. *certified organic, +food-grade

Directions

A little goes a LONG way, so start out with only a few drops. Soapwalla doesn't use fillers or synthetic preservatives in any of its products so their Body Oil is more concentrated than most commercial skin care products. Literally one drop will moisturize your hands and keep them protected yet grease-free for hours. A single bottle of Soapwalla’s Luxurious Body Oil should last for months!

Apply daily after showering or bathing, as you would a moisturizer. This Body Oil quickly and effortlessly soaks into skin, smells like green grass and lazy Sundays, and feels like liquid velvet. Their Body Oil is vegan and is made with the highest quality organic and food-grade ingredients. This product, like all of Soapwalla’s products, does not contain questionable additives such as sodium lauryl sulfate, parabens, harsh and harmful chemicals, or petroleum byproducts. Soapwalla’s Luxurious Body Oil is NEVER tested on animals.

entry.title: Tasting Menu
entry.summary:
Vendor: Soapwalla
Type: Travel Kit
Price: 68.00

Soapwalla's Tasting Menu is a deluxe set of their most luxurious essentials. It contains six of the most popular and beloved Soapwalla products, and is a perfect introduction to this delightful line. The custom screen-printed and lined denim cosmetic bag was specifically created for Soapwalla by Maptote, and is machine washable. The Soapwalla Tasting Menu is the perfect travel companion or gift.

• Restorative Face Serum - 2 drams

• Luxurious Body Oil - 1 fl oz

• Deodorant Cream - 0.5 oz

• Almond Luxe Body Polish - 2 oz

• Hand + Body Wash - 1 oz

• Essential Facial Toning Mist - 1 oz

See individual product pages for ingredients + directions.

Made WITHOUT artificial preservatives, aluminum, parabens, harsh chemicals, dyes, fragrance, silicone, dimethicone, phthalates, sulfates, petroleum, talc, bismuth oxychloride, nanoparticles.

entry.title: Deodorant Cream
entry.summary:
Vendor: Soapwalla
Type: Deodorant
Price: 14.00

Soapwalla’s Deodorant Cream is all natural and uniquely powerful, utilizing superfine vegetable powders and clays, as well as lavender, peppermint and tea tree essential oils to absorb moisture, inhibit bacteria, and ensure a long-lasting and highly effective experience. The frosting-like consistency allows for easy manual application and rapid absorption, and is ideal for all skin types.

• Cruelty Free + Vegan

• 2 oz

Made WITHOUT artificial preservatives, aluminum, parabens, harsh chemicals, dyes, fragrance, silicone, dimethicone, phthalates, sulfates, petroleum, talc, bismuth oxychloride, nanoparticles.

Ingredients

Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Oil*; Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Oil*; Rosehip Seed Oil*; Butyrospermun Parkii (Shea) Butter; Corn Starch*+; Sodium Bicarbonate+; Kaolin Clay; Vegan Kosher Glycerin*+; A Custom Blend Of Essential Oils, including: Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender)*; Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree)*; Citrus Sinensis (Sweet Orange); Mentha Piperita (Peppermint)*; Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergaptene-free Bergamot)*; Non-GMO Soy Lecithin*+; Non-GMO Vitamin E*+.
(*: certified organic, +: food-grade)

Directions

Mix the deodorant cream prior to application. Scoop a small amount and very gently apply to the entire armpit area until completely absorbed. If you typically experience increased skin sensitivity on days when you shave, we’d suggest you refrain from using our Deodorant Cream on those days and resume use the following day. If you have a history of sensitive skin or allergic reactions, please be sure to test body products on a small area inside your wrist for 2-3 days prior to using.
